title: Lucky Shot
description: When Lucky Devereaux decides to move to Parks La for some peace and quiet following the sudden death of her adoptive parents, she never would have imagined the horrors that awaited her. Caught in a whirlwind of grisley murders and ghostly visits, Lucky must race against the clock to stop a killer in her tracks. The only question is, will she stop it before its too late?
author: Heather Briggs
